column1: send a gift marsha v. montgomery mar 2
column4: dc departed this life on june 5
column5: 2015. she is survived by one daughter
column7: whom she loved dearly; and a host of relatives and friends. she had a special warmth for her nieces and nephews. services will be held at mt. calvary missionary baptist church
column12: 2015. viewing at 10 a. m. and services at 11 a. m.
